data.eml:eml: Two novel species of Calonectria isolated from soil in a natural forest in China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, QianLi, Chen, ShuaiFei (2017): Two novel species of Calonectria isolated from soil in a natural forest in China. MycoKeys 26: 25-60, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.26.14688, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.26.14688
